        Each week The Intercept’s D.C. Bureau Chief Ryan Grim unpacks the most consequential news event of the week, while challenging the mainstream media’s tired takes. Grim gives a refreshingly provocative perspective on the ups and downs of American and global politics. New episodes every Friday. New to podcasting? Click here.
